disease: Merkel cell carcinoma of right lower limb, including hip

symptoms.name: Shiny or pearly lump
symptoms.pattern: Appears on sun-exposed areas of skin, commonly face, neck, arms, eyelids; legs in darker-skinned individuals; torso in younger individuals. May break open into a wound or sore.

physical_findings: Swollen lymph nodes (indicating potential cancer spread)

supportive: Imaging tests (e.g., CT scan, MRI, PET scan) to determine stage
